content: Which famous artist painted the iconic works "Starry Night" and "Sunflowers" during the late 19th century?

The famous artist who painted "Starry Night" and "Sunflowers" during the late 19th century is Vincent van Gogh. Van Gogh was a Dutch Post-Impressionist painter known for his expressive and emotional artwork. "Starry Night" was created in 1889, while "Sunflowers" was painted in 1888. Both works are considered masterpieces and have had a significant impact on the art world.
